comments:
I get a "java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError" error when I'm trying to launch my 
plugin in eclipse 3.1. 

The plugin worked well in 3.0.1 and all the libraries are in place and included 
in the plugin.xml file.

The full stack trace received when running with -debug is given below. All other 
modules of the plugin works as expected and the use external libraries as well 
all of which are stored in a /lib folder

Please Help and thanks in advance,

Tyrell

Two possibilities:
 - your plugin does not express its requirement on the jasper plugin in its
manifest.mf
 - the manifest.mf of the jasper plugin does not export the packages
